body:
Hello there Avicadians, so yesterday I got promoted to Senior Moderator and it's been 7 months since I got promoted to Junior Moderator. The last time I made an AMA was a long time ago so I wanted to do one now if you have some questions that you wanted to ask me before. (I'm not copying anyone :v)

Introduction:
My name is Mario (don't make that joke ERIC) and I'm 15 years old. I joined into Avicus a long time ago (probably 1 year ago, can't remember now) and I'm really active on this server since I joined. I got promoted to Junior Moderator on September 2 and yesterday I got promoted to Senior Moderator.
I'm from Mexico and viva mexico.

Some usernames:
  • Brokennz (kutirik)
  • AbusiveUser (I lost this account :/)
  • Passively

I will try to be 100% honest, so this is a brutal honest AMA (I won't roast unless you want to). Also, if you see a question that has been answered before, don't ask the same question because I will not be answering those questions.

:)
body_tagged:

I'm from Mexico and viva mexico.

Some usernames:

I will try to be 100% honest, so this is a brutal honest AMA (I won't roast unless you want to). Also, if you see a question that has been answered before, don't ask the same question because I will not be answering those questions.

:)

replies.body: opinion
replies.body_tagged: opinion

replies.body:
Opinions?
You are a really good friend, one of the best Administrators. It's really funny to talk with you but sometimes I can't understand what you said because you speak faster than a formula 1 car; but yes, I can understand you most of the time.
You make sometimes but MeMyselfAndGhost has the best memes out there. So if I need to choose the best memer, I would choose you as second option. I really laugh with your memes even if they are bad. It's really nice that we are still talking since the first time I joined the server so that's why I consider you one of my best friends on the server.

What went through your head when you were told you got senior?
To be honest, I was so nervous and excited at the same time. I didn't expect to be promoted to Senior Moderator, so when I PieZ gave the rank I was saying "Are you kidding me"? so, that was my reaction :).
My head was like a bomb, that's what I can say xd

Opinions on Horizon?
It's a team with potential, your players are really good at PvP but I'm seeing that some of them are getting inactive and because of that, the team may be losing experience. Would be nice if you guys win a tournament or get into Semi or Finals :)
i'm still crying cuz u guys kicked me :(

How's streaming every Saturday going???? xDDDDD
JAJAJAJAJAJAJAJAJA, it was good back to those days, but when you became inactive and I lost the interest. I don't ask you to stream anymore because you always say "I'll be there!" and you don't wake up or you ignore me :'v.
But would be great stream with you again :D

replies.body:
who is or was your avicus crush?
A Cupcake.

if you could get one retired player to return who would it be?
Dyeh

most grouchy/ignorant person on avicus?
Nobody

nicest and friendliest person on avicus?
I met a lot of people that are really friendly with me and with other people, so it's really difficult to choose one right now, but I would say Murphh or even yourself.

do you think you deserve senior and who else deserves it?
In my personal opinion, I wasn't expecting to be Senior at this point, I wasn't try harding to get anything I was doing my job as a Moderator. I believe I deserve it but I honestly don't know.
I would say TylerdotMichael or alexanderjoe.

thoughts on the new juniors?
They are really good people, and friendly people. I'm pretty sure they will get Moderator if they continue with they hard work :)

which rank is your favourite?
Map Developer

which staff member is your favourite?
Strucken, Walt, Spartemex and Junr

favourite spanish pal?
Prodigy4532

opinions? [this better be a paragraph]
Well my dear Josh, you are a really good friend and great person. When I saw you got promoted to Junior Moderator I thought you were embittered and not friendly but I see I was wrong. Your Moderation skills are pretty good, so before you retire I thought you were going to get Senior Moderator because you seemed that you were tryharding it.
It's really nice to talk with you even if you are muted xd so I hope we can talk more :)

replies.body:
Opinions?
You are a great guy and a great Senior Moderator. From what I could see, you are a meme lover, which is cool in my opinion because I also love memes.
You need to work on some things about your Moderator skills. We don't talk a lot so I think we should but I think the timezones are not the best to get a conversation :(

What are some of your proudest achievements in real life and gaming?
This is a difficult one, but I would say that I was really unpatient in the past so I'm now patient which is amazingly good (I consider this an achivement because it was so hard)

And gaming, getting Senior Moderator for sure.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Opinions?

You are a really good guy, amazing Moderator and Mentor. I must say that sometimes you can be weird as me, your jokes makes an impression that you are weird when we talk but I really enjoy talk with you because you make me laugh. You as a friend are amazing, you can keep secrets and don't tell to anyone so that's why I trust on you; I can talk with you about my private stuff in life and I'm pretty sure you like to read my messages (or probably I'm wrong xd), and of course, you are loyal.
Thanks to you, I become Senior Moderator, for all the things you taught me, fixing my grammar errors (I still have some xd). So, the only thing I can say it's: thanks.

When will you buy Overwatch? :3
Soon™

Opinions on team Emoji?
Worst team ever xdd

Opinions on Home?
I can't give you an opinion to you because I haven't talked with the HOME members, but it seems they like to build houses.

replies.body:
Hello, so I can't give you a proper opinion on you because I don't know you that well but from what I could see from you, you seems mature and a little bit shy. As a Moderator you are good but I have to say your skills are weird, as a mentor you are good but I need to see more closely how you work with the Junior Mods.

Oh yeah, I forgot you are a Map Developer, so what I have to say it's that you are kinda good. I haven't seen any map from you in a while but atleast you are active making decision for the team.
I hope we can talk more often :)

replies.body:
Opinions?
Lo voy a escribir en español ya me da mucha flojera escribir esto en ingles, así que haya vamos. Por lo que he visto eres amistoso con la gente y tenia una imagen tuya errónea antes de conocerte (cuando eras líder de Squadcat en los tiempos de Overcast Network) pensaba que antes eras una persona que no le gustaba hablar con los demás y tomarse muy enserio el juego, pero estoy equivocado o tal vez cambiaste tu forma de ser.

Respecto al PvP eres bueno, aunque he de admitir que muchas veces he pensado que estas usando algún tipo de cliente (vaya, pienso esto desde hace mucho xd) ya que tu manera de PvPear cambia muchísimo, muchas veces no la pegas y otras veces la pegas muy duro.
Como Media te hacen falta mejor muchísimas cosas pero son mínimas, una vez que las soluciones serás mejor :)

Will you carry prodi to Sr?
Ya no depende de mi, dependerá todo de el :)

Have you ever dreamed in being part of squadcat?
No

Opinions?
Amazing guy, you are one of the best guys I met on the server. It's funny to talk with you but we don't do it very often so would be nice if we start to talk again (like we usted to before).
Your PVP skills are improving, you are getting better at pvp everyday :) 

And I didn't know you are a CS:GO player, you surprised me yesterday. You were my carry the last match of Comp LOL. And please, recommend me (make this little boi happy ;() i LOVe you

I thought it was September 8th we got Junior? I might be wrong but I'm pretty sure. xD
No, it was on September 2 because I remember it was on a friday when we got our interview.

replies.body: Lyer! siempre soñaste ser parte del glorioso SQUADCATT
replies.body_tagged: Lyer! siempre soñaste ser parte del glorioso SQUADCATT

reply_to.body:
Opinions?
Lo voy a escribir en español ya me da mucha flojera escribir esto en ingles, así que haya vamos. Por lo que he visto eres amistoso con la gente y tenia una imagen tuya errónea antes de conocerte (cuando eras líder de Squadcat en los tiempos de Overcast Network) pensaba que antes eras una persona que no le gustaba hablar con los demás y tomarse muy enserio el juego, pero estoy equivocado o tal vez cambiaste tu forma de ser.

Respecto al PvP eres bueno, aunque he de admitir que muchas veces he pensado que estas usando algún tipo de cliente (vaya, pienso esto desde hace mucho xd) ya que tu manera de PvPear cambia muchísimo, muchas veces no la pegas y otras veces la pegas muy duro.
Como Media te hacen falta mejor muchísimas cosas pero son mínimas, una vez que las soluciones serás mejor :)

Will you carry prodi to Sr?
Ya no depende de mi, dependerá todo de el :)

Have you ever dreamed in being part of squadcat?
No

replies.body: Passive what are your opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged: Passive what are your opinions on me?

replies.body:
Opnion

as I said this is a brutal honest AMA so I will go ahead and say my honest opinion on yourself.

When I joined Cronus for the first time and I met you, I thought you were cool and funny with your jokes but then you joined Apollo and the things changed. I saw a little change on your behaviour and you were getting toxicity but we still talked.
You are really good at building and I'm not going to deny it but you lack of effort when you make them (at least I saw that when you were builder).

But now my opinions changed, you are still toxic or even more than the last time. You are inmature and sometimes you are annonying with your bad jokes.
I'm also sad because you think I'm hacking on mineman servers when I'm not, I used to trust on you but now I think you don't see me as a friend anymore, you now see me as another hacker which makes me feel sad because I used to trust on you.
